import { useState } from "react"; import "./App.css"; export default function App() { const [view, setView] = useState("choice"); const [existingEmail, setExistingEmail] = useState(""); const [newEmail, setNewEmail] = useState(""); const [tempEmail, settempEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [currentChat, setCurrentChat] = useState(null); const [messageInput, setMessageInput] = useState(""); const [chats, setChats] = useState({user1: [], user2: []}); // Choice screen if (view === "choice") { return (

Welcome to Event Scout

Plan, Post, and RSVP to Amazing Events!

); } if (view === "login") { return (

Login

Sign in to your Account

setExistingEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder="you@example.com" required className="input" />
setPassword(e.target.value)} placeholder="••••••••" required className="input" />
); } if (view === "register") { return (

Register

Create your Account

setName(e.target.value)} placeholder="First Last" required className="input" />
setNewEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder="you@example.com" required className="input" />
setPassword(e.target.value)} placeholder="••••••••" required className="input" />
); } if(view === "profile") { return (

{name}

{existingEmail}

Events

event1
event2
); } if(view === "following") { return (

Following

); } if(view === "followers") { return (

Following

); } if(view === "settings") { return (

Settings

); } if(view === "change-email") { return (

Change Email

setExistingEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder="you@example.com" required className="input" />
setPassword(e.target.value)} placeholder="••••••••" required className="input" />
); } if(view === "chat-list") { return (

Chats

); } if(view === "chat") { const handleSendMessage = () => { if (messageInput.trim() && currentChat) { const newMessage = { sender: "me", text: messageInput, timestamp: new Date().toLocaleTimeString([], { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' }) }; setChats(prevChats => ({ ...prevChats, [currentChat]: [...prevChats[currentChat], newMessage] })); setMessageInput(""); } }; const currentMessages = currentChat ? chats[currentChat] : []; return (

{currentChat}

{currentMessages.map((msg, index) => (
{msg.sender === "me" ? "You: " : msg.sender||": "}
{msg.text}
{msg.timestamp}
))}
setMessageInput(e.target.value)} onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleSendMessage()} placeholder="Type a message..." />
); } }
